name: SPACE-FRIGHT
description: SPACE-FRIGHT is a cute stealth horror game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4500U CPU @ 1.80GHz DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or Radeon HD 5770 (1 GB VRAM) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
